JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Vil du arbejde som tjener på et resort i Holland?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Cool Waiter/waitress job in Holland, with accommodation and paid training.

If you speak English and one other European language and have a little experience i hospitality, then this job might be the one for you. 

It will give you a great opportunity to try and live abroad, work in an international environment. 

We are searching for waiter/waitress for different hotels and holiday parks in the Netherlands.

They need to be:

  • fluent in English;
  • flexible working different shifts;
  • able to work fulltime;
  • passionate about hospitality;
  • have experience in a guest oriented job;

 

The salaries start at 10,50€/h netto, however the employees receive the ET regulation and holiday money, therefore they can earn 1800-1900€ a month. If there are very good the price can go higher to around 11€/h which can make in the end 2k.

The accommodation also differ per client, it is always provided in 90% of the cases its free, however sometimes they need to pay , max 400€ a month.
